Then the movie would have been about 2 hours and 20 minutes 


And the drone was kind of pointless 
Even the school scene was unneeded, like yes Murphy is smart... we know movie

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5540576b636872202d661a00#post_5540576b636872202d661a00
Y yo encontré a la reina de las milfs en una caricatura: apoyado por los empeños de un honbre bajo el pseudónimo de Wagner (aunque desafortunadamente no el Dr. wagner) hemos logrado dar vida a la fantasía de todo amante de las milfs.
Soy un hombre polifacético, escribo de ciencias, hago con mis disertaciones, mas homoeróticas las luchas y contribuyo a la creación de sex symbols. Te deo mi resumen de la misma:
Even without dear Wagners particlar approach (which, I admit, enjoy very much and congratulate him for) the character of Mrs. danuza is still very provocative. A brazilian woman of bronze skin with an admirable body toned by years of the hardening labor of dance with long, flawless black hair crowning a face without a single trace of having more than 40 years, all this even after  enduring three pregnancies and the hardships of what we can see is an extremely loving motherhood, add to that the fact that she spends all day occupied by the chores of the house and her own work (which surey makes her quite sweaty) in a leotard and leg warmers and bang. She clearly is the queen of milfs, a "tremendísima mulata" if I might add. B
